com.ge.dspmicro.machinegateway.api.adapter

Interface IMachineAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISubscriptionMachineAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMachineAdapter, AbstractSubscriptionMachineAdapter

    public interface IMachineAdapter
    Interface for machine adapter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UUID getId()
      Gets the unique ID for the adapter.
      MachineAdapterInfo getInfo() 
      List<PDataNode> getNodes() 
      MachineAdapterState getState()

      Read from a datasource, specified by symbolic name

      Write to a datasource, specified by symbolic name

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        UUID getId()
        Gets the unique ID for the adapter. This is NOT persisted over restart of the adapter.
        Returns:
        a unique ID

      • getInfo

        MachineAdapterInfo getInfo()
        Returns:
        Machine Adapter info (name, description, version)

      • getNodes

        List<PDataNode> getNodes()
        Returns:
        a list of data nodes

      • getState

        MachineAdapterState getState()
        Returns:
        current state of Machine Adapter

      • readData

        PDataValue readData(UUID nodeId)
                    throws MachineAdapterException
        Read from a datasource, specified by symbolic name
        Parameters:
        nodeId - local identying name for the datasource (not the nodeId)
        Returns:
        data value read from the adapter or null
        Throws:
        MachineAdapterException - if node is not found

      • writeData

        void writeData(UUID nodeId,
             PDataValue value)
               throws MachineAdapterException
        Write to a datasource, specified by symbolic name
        Parameters:
        nodeId - local identying name for the datasource (not the nodeId)
        value - datavalue to be written
        Throws:
        MachineAdapterException - if node is not found
